meanings.definition: A school or class for young children before they start formal education.
meanings.sent1: At kindergarten, children learn to share and play together.
meanings.sent2: I remember my first day at kindergarten, I was so excited!
meanings.sent3: The kindergarten classroom was filled with colorful toys and books.
meanings.sent4: In the world of education, kindergarten is like a warm hug before the big adventure.
meanings.sent5: The laughter and joy in the kindergarten room made it a magical place.

meanings.definition: The first year of school for young children, typically aged five.
meanings.sent1: My little sister will start kindergarten next year.
meanings.sent2: During kindergarten, kids learn their ABCs and 123s.
meanings.sent3: The kindergarten teacher wore a big smile every morning.
meanings.sent4: Kindergarten is like a colorful puzzle where kids learn and grow.
meanings.sent5: The kindergarten playground was a place of endless fun and laughter.
